content: The world's largest desert, covering approximately 3.6 million square miles, is located in which continent?

I believe the world's largest desert is the Sahara Desert, which is located in Africa. It covers an area of about 3.6 million square miles, making it the largest hot desert in the world. However, if we consider cold deserts as well, the largest desert is actually the Antarctic Desert, covering around 5.5 million square miles. But based on your description, it seems you're referring to the Sahara in Africa.
